On Friday 21 August 2015 09:11 AM, mvaayoo.business8 wrote:

DearSir/Maam,

Detailed Information for Getting a Transactional Route Account.

* You need to send us an Email after Registration (if you are not a registered user) stating What kind ofSMS will be Sent (in Template Form mentioned on below mail) from Your Account & to Whom.

* After receiving your mail we will forward that to our Backend team for Checking theEligibility whether theSms Content stated is eligible for Transactional

* If Approved, We will share some Document with you which you need to Sign & Stamp on theRs 100 Stamp Paper.

* After Receiving the Documents By you 1st you need to Send the Scanned copy to us on our Official mail Id I.E. business8@mvaayoo.com

*Once the Documents are receivedwe will Create a new Account for you with openDND Route & the 6 DIGIT Sender ID you have opted for.

Template form:

Templates details for your reference:

Hi, the onetime verification code for <XXXX> is <XXXX>. Please enter this to verify you phone number in <XXXX>.

Note

XXXX will be consider as a variable Data where it can be anything.

Space also matter in templates creation and you can send only approved sms to your members.

Notice: Using Transactional account you are not authorized to send any type of greetings, Promotions, Wishes, Disocunts, Offers or Marketing campaign related messages, for this we suggest to send sms using Promotional route account where documents also not needed.

Warm Regards:


Rahul Kumar Jain
Manager, Enterprise Mobility Sales

346.plain:
1. eseafoods.in

2. HTTP - supported but not HTTPS ( we need to buy the SSL certificate )

3. CentOS 7 ( Linux )

4. Nginx

5. PHP 5.4

6. Hosted Page

On Friday 21 August 2015 09:11 AM, mvaayoo.business8 wrote:

DearSir/Maam,

Detailed Information for Getting a Transactional Route Account.

* You need to send us an Email after Registration (if you are not a registered user) stating What kind ofSMS will be Sent (in Template Form mentioned on below mail) from Your Account & to Whom.

* After receiving your mail we will forward that to our Backend team for Checking theEligibility whether theSms Content stated is eligible for Transactional

* If Approved, We will share some Document with you which you need to Sign & Stamp on theRs 100 Stamp Paper.

* After Receiving the Documents By you 1st you need to Send the Scanned copy to us on our Official mail Id I.E. business8@mvaayoo.com

*Once the Documents are receivedwe will Create a new Account for you with openDND Route & the 6 DIGIT Sender ID you have opted for.

Template form:

Templates details for your reference:

Hi, the onetime verification code for <XXXX> is <XXXX>. Please enter this to verify you phone number in <XXXX>.

Note

XXXX will be consider as a variable Data where it can be anything.

Space also matter in templates creation and you can send only approved sms to your members.

Notice: Using Transactional account you are not authorized to send any type of greetings, Promotions, Wishes, Disocunts, Offers or Marketing campaign related messages, for this we suggest to send sms using Promotional route account where documents also not needed.

Warm Regards:


Rahul Kumar Jain
Manager, Enterprise Mobility Sales
